How many people are affected by xeroderma pigmentosum ?,"Xeroderma pigmentosum is a rare disorder; it is estimated to affect about 1 in 1 million people in the United States and Europe. The condition is more common in Japan, North Africa, and the Middle East.",GHR,xeroderma pigmentosum
